1674.83.text:
so that we're creating good

1677.83.text:
here in America, here

Rather than

of those who have already got

folks who have huge

1690.17.text:
and ingenuity but just need a

1691.60.text:
bit of a hand up so that we can

1695.67.text:
I mean, this isn't

There are some things that
are complicated --

1711.13.text:
Let's make sure every
4-year-old in America

1713.10.text:
has access to high school --

1718.30.text:
and dads like Ben know their

1720.47.text:
the best quality care and

1727.47.text:
Let's redesign our high

1729.20.text: sure that our kids are better prepared

1732.93.text:
Let's follow the lead

1735.23.text:

1737.73.text:
that connect young people

1743.87.text:
Let's tell every American
if they've lost their

1745.40.text: job because it was shipped overseas,

1747.43.text:
we're going to train you for an

1754.10.text:
Let's rally
around the patriotism that

1756.33.text:
says our country is
stronger when

1758.20.text:
every American can count

1761.17.text:
insurance and Medicare and

1764.57.text:
and women earn pay equal to

1766.97.text:

and when nobody who works

1774.30.text:
We can do all

1776.60.text:
And so let me just -- let
me wrap up by saying this.

1786.97.text:
I know sometimes things
get kind of discouraging.

1794.30.text:
And I know that our
politics looks

1797.00.text:
profoundly broken, and
Washington looks like

1800.20.text: it's never going to deliver for you.

1809.83.text:
And I know that when I was

1811.70.text:
and then reelected in 2012, so
many of you were hoping

1815.67.text:
that we could get Washington to

1818.60.text:
and sometimes when I get

1823.07.text:
oh, maybe not; maybe it's just

1832.97.text:
And the critics and the
cynics in Washington,

1839.13.text:
they've written me off
more times

1845.07.text:
But I'm here to tell
you, don't get cynical.

1857.73.text:
are families who have health
insurance

1859.17.text: now who didn't have it before.

1860.40.text:
And there are students

1864.90.text: on the job who didn't have jobs before.

1867.10.text:
And there are troops home

1871.47.text:
Don't think

1880.63.text:
So, yes, it's easy to be

1882.30.text: in fact, these days it's kind of trendy.

1889.97.text:
But cynicism doesn't

1898.73.text:
Cynicism doesn't send

0:31:38.867,1193:02:47.295
Cynicism doesn't build a

1907.43.text:
Cynicism doesn't give

And every day I'm lucky to

of the country, and I hope you

to me and I want her to know

I ran for

And I'm always going

And your cares and your
